resources.string:
To use External Mouse:
	Disable Mouse Acceleration inside the Guest OS.
		For DSL use command: xset m 1
"		For Other OSes disable "Enhance pointer Precision" or choose Mouse "usb-tablet" from Vectras main options.
	Plug in or Pair your USB/Bluetooth Mouse and press OK
	Move your mouse pointer to all desktop sides to calibrate.
"

Enter the repeater address only if you are using an
UltraVNC-type repeater
IMPORTED ROMS WILL BE SHOWN HERE

This enables virtual machines running on the Vectras VM to play audio using Termux. If you have not set up Termux yet, select Start setup, the command will be automatically copied to the clipboard, you need paste that command and run it in Termux to complete the setup. Next times, make sure Termux is running to play sound.
You need to install Termux before setting up.
The Android OS or CPU on your device does not support 64 bit, which means the VM will have poor performance and be unstable when running.
The virtual machine list data is corrupted and needs to be repaired. Do you want to start repairing now?
You have not added any storage devices to start using or install an operating system. Do you want to continue creating?
You need to give this virtual machine a new name.
The virtual machine cannot run because CPU or Android OS on your phone does not support 64bit to use Multi-threaded TCG. Do you want to continue running the virtual machine with Single-threaded TCG?
All virtual machines will be erased including all your ROMs. Do you want to continue?
Tap the Create button at the bottom to start creating a new virtual machine. Or…
You need to allow access to the storage to continue.
Do you want to kill all Qemu processes?
All running VMs will be forcibly shut down.
There is nothing here because there is no VM running.
A serious problem has occurred! This problem is caused by the CPU or Android operating system on your device. You can join our community to learn more.
Format not supported, please select file with format cvbi.
A problem has occurred and cannot continue because the cbvi file was not found. Error code: CR_CVBI1.
An error has occurred. Extraction was successful but the cvbi file does not contain information about this ROM so some default settings will be used. Error code: CR_CVBI2.
An error has occurred and cannot continue. The extraction was successful but the cvbi file does not contain information for this ROM and does not contain any ROM files. Error code: CR_CVBI3.
ROMs, files and folders that are no longer in use will be deleted.
Things may not work because the file format is not supported. Do you want to continue?
You cannot use IDE hard drive type with ARM64. If you continue, the default hard drive type will be used.
The system is not working, necessary files are missing. This problem may be caused by incorrect setup. Do you want to try the setup again? Error code: PROOT_IS_MISSING_0.

An error occurred and the virtual machine cannot start. There are two or more drives that cannot be plugged into the same slot. Please check your virtual machine settings and make sure all drives are not plugged into the same slot. Error code: DRIVE_INDEX_0_EXISTS.

An error occurred and the virtual machine is not running. The X11 display is temporarily unavailable, please exit the Vectras VM and come back to try again. You can try switching to VNC which is more stable. Error code: X11_NOT_AVAILABLE.
Switched to VNC. You can try running the virtual machine again now.
Deleted virtual machines will be restored if you previously chose to keep all files.
QEMU Params is empty. Some hardware to be emulated will be set by default by QEMU.
This ROM is missing too much information and it may not work, this error is caused by the person who created it incorrectly.
This ROM may not be compatible as it is for an older version.
Fixed successfully. But some virtual machines may disappear and they were moved to the Recycle bin folder.
The fix fails and all your virtual machines no longer appear in the virtual machine list. They were moved to the Recycle bin folder.
A potentially harmful command was detected and it has been blocked. Please check this virtual machine and try again.
Always copy the selected file to the virtual machine instead of using it directly.
If you find that your system is having serious problems, you can reinstall the system. And all virtual machines will be kept.
A problem occurred and the virtual machine failed to run because a file or directory that the virtual machine needs to run does not exist.
Automatically create new hard drive when creating new virtual machine
All data will be erased except the system.
Do you want to change or remove?
Do you want to change, create or remove?
Do you want to change the mirror before setting up?\nThe current mirror is:
Welcome to Vectras VM. Let\'s get started!
Processing...\nThis may take a few minutes.
Switch to check for updates on the Beta channel now.
You need to complete Vectras VM setup before importing this file.
Unable to create directory to create virtual machine, this may be because you have not granted permission, there is not enough free space of internal storage or other.
Not the command to run Qemu.
Commands are not allowed to contain \"&\".
Commands are not allowed to contain multiple lines.
Commands are not allowed to contain \";\".
Commands are not allowed to contain \"|\".
Size too large, try qcow2 format.

By using any files of this ROM or any files containing anything in any way, you agree that we (developers or contributors to Vectras VM) and the creator or creators of this ROM or these files will not be responsible for any unintended problems that will happen to you and your things. But if the creator or creators of this ROM or these files are confirmed to intentionally want to cause harm to you or anyone else, the creator or creators of this ROM or these files will be responsible. And it also means that you have agreed to the Terms and Policies of the owner, provider or owners, providers of the operating system or operating systems contained in this ROM.
When you import any ROM or use files that contain anything, you accept all of this. Click here to read it all.
Join now on Telegram if you want.
If you really like Vectras VM, you can donate to us on Patreon. Thanks a lot!
Shared Folder is not used because i386 does not support it.
Do you want to remove it? You can choose to keep or not keep the files.
Language, check for updates and files.
You will receive updates to experience the latest features early.
We recommend you to use it. You can run Windows, Linux and more with the highest performance compared to other architectures.
You can run Windows, Linux and other operating systems intended for ARM.
You can run older x86 operating systems with greater compatibility than x86_64.
You can run older versions of Mac OS and other operating systems intended for the PowerPC architecture.
You can import now by selecting the file in cvbi format.
Learn more about this open source emulator.
Create new virtual machines for Vectras VM with easier customization.
Import or choose an architecture to start creating.
You can drag and drop cvbi file to Import card to import.
It has been tested to work and is not harmful to the device. But it may not work on your device.
Untested, it may not work or have unexpected behavior.
You need to enter the device ID.
This is not a removable device.
Do you want to shut down or reset? This can cause some unexpected problems for the virtual machine.

Do you want to shut down or reset? This can cause some unexpected problems for the virtual machine. Select Power to press the power button. You can leave without shutting down by pressing and holding the exit button or pressing the back key.
The VNC port you need to connect to is
Need to set smaller screen number
Leave password blank if you do not want to set a password.
The VNC Server port you set is currently in use by another virtual machine, app, or service. You can change the settings and run the virtual machine again.
You need to set a number for the display.
Invalid file path, please select a file from elsewhere.
The file you selected is not in the correct format, please select an iso file.
Unable to copy iso file, try selecting this iso file elsewhere.
Unable to copy hard drive file, try selecting this iso file elsewhere.
Could not process cvbi file, the file path is invalid or the file may be corrupted.
Unable to process cvbi file because virtual machine directory creation failed
The available storage space on your device is too low. Please clean up.
The virtual machine list data is corrupted, do you want to repair it?
The virtual machine cache directory failed to create. Please try again later.
See if there are any new updates.
Update now to experience the latest features and fix issues.
You can shut down this virtual machine by clicking the Stop button in the System monitor. To control it, connect to this port:
Data about the virtual machines has been corrupted and needs to be repaired.
There is not enough storage available on your device to set up. Please clear up and try again later.
The VNC screen will restart every time there is a change, which helps troubleshoot problems.
An error occurred while deleting the file, please try again later.
There is no app to perform this action.
The shared folder is too large. Please delete some of the following files so that the total size of all files in the shared folder does not exceed 516 MB.
An error occurred and the virtual machine could not be run.
An error occurred and the virtual machine could not be started. Another process is using a file that this virtual machine also needs. Find and terminate that process.
Something went wrong. Could not create directory to save cvbi file.
To start up faster the next time you open Vectras VM if you don\'t remove it from multitasking.
Your device\'s Android OS or CPU doesn\'t support 64-bit, which means you can\'t use this feature.
The file could not be processed, possibly due to an invalid file path or a corrupted file. Please try again later.
Focus or defocus the QEMU window
Automatically change color according to the system.
Settings for importing and exporting roms.
Skip size calculation when importing rom if needed for faster import but import progress will not be shown.
Check and detect data errors when exporting rom, you can turn it off for faster exporting.
Unable to connect to Alpine Linux server or it is temporarily down, please try checking your network connection, change another mirror or try again in a few hours.
An error occurred while installing system files. You can try uninstalling and reinstalling this app to fix it.
How do you want to install?
Recommended and setup will automatically install everything.
If you want to manually select the bootstrap file you want to install the Qemu version you desire.
Choose the mirror closest to you for faster setup.
Please do not disconnect the network. This may take a few minutes.
The setup could not be completed and below is the log.
This option is temporarily unavailable because the server cannot be connected.
Vectras VM cannot run on this device.
The required package is not installed, you need to install it before using this feature.
Termux:X11 app is not installed, you need to install it to continue.
Quickly detect errors to avoid wasting time decompressing and errors occurring after decompression.
X11 display cannot be used at this time, try closing and reopening the Vectras VM.
To run commands with Qemu monitor easier without switching.
A system update is available, update now for a full experience.
Turn it on if you want to use 3dfx and play old retro games (only with x86_64 and i386).
You need to switch to SDL to use 3dfx.
Your device\'s CPU supports acceleration for 3dfx. But it may be unstable or not working.
Your device\'s CPU does not support acceleration for 3dfx.
We are very sorry about an incident that occurred and app crashed earlier.
An error occurred and VM was not created.
An error occurred and VM was not modified.
You can edit this VM with Create command app.
Unable to save, please try again later.
Vterm was unable to install the bootstrap packages.
Vterm can only be installed on the primary user account.
Close down existing ones before creating new.
Click URL to copy or long press to open
No URL found in the terminal.
The Vterm:Style add-on is not installed.
Here you can set value of extra-keys variable like in Termux app (read this) and more (e.g. META). Put empty string for the default value.
Join us on Telegram where we publish all the news and updates and receive your opinions and bugs.
Getting ready for you…\nPlease don\'t disconnect the network.
You need to grant permission to access the storage before use.
Find and allow access to storage in Settings.
Do you want to set it up automatically or select the bootstrap file manually?
Something went wrong during setup. Would you like to try again?
You can choose between auto download and setup or manual setup by choosing bootstrap file.
Reseed screen while soft keyboard is open
The screen size will be adjusted while Soft Keyboard is open.
Show app in picture-in-picture mode when home button or recents button is pressed
Toggles immersive mode in your device display
Apply display scale factor to touchpad
Stylus touch override, left middle or right click (Only for the stylus)
Onscreen mouse buttons usable with touchpad
Intercept all hardware mouse events. Pointer is back to Android after pressing Escape key.
Hide additional keyboard on Volume Down key press
Deactivate special keys on additional key bar after each keypress
Let X server handle hardware keyboard layout (with DE settings or setxkbmap).
Fixes scancodes on some devices. Might cause problems with multiple layouts.
Enable Accessibility service for intercepting system shortcuts manually.
Pause key intercepting with Esc key
The X11 feature is currently not supported on Android 14 and above. Please use a device with Android 13 or below for X11 functionality.
Press Volume Down for Right Click
Press Volume Up for Left Click
Press Back Button for Hide/Show Controls UI
Adjust display height for extra keys bar
May cause screen flickering during toggling EK bar
Show software keyboard while hardware keyboard is connected. Requires WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission.
Enable Accessibility service for intercepting system shortcuts automatically.
Allows you to use Dex shortcuts while intercepting.
Use long-tap to lock special keys
